Posts.Content: find another doctor as fast as you can if this doctor wont help you then find one that will you cant afford to mess around with a doctor who wont listen to you YOU know your body better than anyone if he wont take that into consideration then you dont need him                       good luck and god bless i wish you all the best
Posts.Title: Can someone please give me some peace

Posts.Content: i hope it turns out to be nothing but you do need to make sure find a doctor who will do what needs to be done to be sure you do not have cancer its too important to ignore or put off                                              good luck and god bless
Posts.Title: Hello..I have a few questions...

Posts.Content: i have posted here before and appreciated the help i got and now im back i'll try to make this a short story.... my gf had breast cancer the chemo made it grow fast she was stage 4 in a matter of a few months they did a radical modified masectomy she did the radiation 6 months later it came back in 3 months she is stage 4 again its in the liver lymphnodes all the way down her neck and chest and in the pancrease the doc (finally) put her on xelodia and morphine now she is in the hospital with kiddney function problems and memory loss lack of balance and tremors she sleeps all the time and makes no sense when she talks even when they cut her meds back there was very little change can anyone help the doctors dont know or wont say  please any help u could give me would be appreciated
Posts.Title: please help i dont know what is wrong

Posts.Content: i think this will be the last time i am on here for awhile my girlfriends cancer was just to aggressive doctors here and in st.louis could do nothing to stop it and have not seen a cancer like it in our area before  on july 4th at around 9:30 am janet lost her battle with cancer but she never stopped fighting they had her on alot of meds to keep her asleep so it would not hurt so much they said by midnight on the 3rd she would be gone she showed them nine and a half hours later i am was and always will be proud of her she never gave up no matter what i hope everyone who reads this takes this.......................................... message with them keep faith keep hope love god and fight like the devil                               god blees and goodnight
Posts.Title: please help i dont know what is wrong

Posts.Content: i think this will be the last time i am on here for awhile my girlfriends cancer was just to aggressive doctors here and in st.louis could do nothing to stop it and have not seen a cancer like it in our area before  on july 4th at around 9:30 am janet S  41  lost her battle with cancer but she never stopped fighting they had her on alot of meds to keep her asleep so it would not hurt so much they said by midnight on the 3rd she would be gone she showed them nine and a half hours later i am was and always will be proud of her she never gave up no matter what i hope everyone who reads this takes this message with them   keep faith keep hope love god and fight like the devil    i wish all of you the best of luck to all of you  your support has helped me alot and we hope her sacrifice will help you all in order to help find a cure she wanted he body donated to science she wanted to help make sure no other families had too lose a loved one i will keep you al in my prayers      godbless all of you and keep you safe till  a cure is found
Posts.Title: we lost but we never gave up

Posts.Content: thank you for your replies please keep them coming she has had a mri and a ct scan in the recent past and is having another of each tomorrow and she has been in the hospital for a week on constant fluid she is on xeloda morphine and valium for her depression they were over medicating her but have cut back the dosage at this time thats all we know i know this she is 41 strong willed and has beat stage 4 once b4 god willing she can do it again thank you for your responses please keep them coming if u can think of anything else                                                                 thank you all and god bless
